title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7336.5 - Celebration of religious holidays or festivals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7336.5 - Celebration of religious holidays or festivals

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of section
7336.1
(c) of this

Part, youth shall be permitted to celebrate religious holidays or festivals of
the religious faith with which they are affiliated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7336.5

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
